summary:
This mod makes all the housecarls in the game wear nordic carved armor (No Helmet). Also changes all their gear to nordic so if the housecarl originally had a War axe then they have a Nordic War Axe.

What All housecarls have:
Nordic armor (Boots, Gloves, Torso)
Nordic Bow
Nordic Arrows
Have 2 of their main weap

Mod Name:Nordic Housecarls

Source:Skyrim Nexus
Author(s):DarkWolfModding

Use the Forums tab to comment or suggest things to this mod

Description:
This mod makes all the housecarls in the game wear nordic carved armor (No Helmet). Also changes all their gear to nordic so if the housecarl originally had a War axe then they have a Nordic War Axe.

What All housecarls have:
Nordic armor (Boots, Gloves, Torso)
Nordic Bow
Nordic Arrows
Have 2 of their main weapon (ex: 2 War axes, 2 Swords, ect..)

I recommend using Amazing follower tweaks with this mod.

Installation:
Use NMM for ease of install and uninstall

Uninstallation:
Use NMM

Requirements:
Skyrim (Latest Version)
Hearthfire
Dawnguard (cuz I may expand into dawnguard with this mod, as of now nothing has been used for dawnguard)
Dragonborn

Change Log:

-Initial Relese
